org.gradle.api

Interface Plugin<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object which this plugin can configure.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AntlrPlugin, BasePlugin, BuildDashboardPlugin, EarPlugin, GroovyBasePlugin, GroovyPlugin, IvyPublishPlugin, JavaBasePlugin, JavaLanguagePlugin, JavaPlugin, JettyPlugin, JvmLanguagePlugin, LanguageBasePlugin, MavenPlugin, MavenPublishPlugin, NativeBinariesModelPlugin, ProjectReportsPlugin, PublishingPlugin, ReportingBasePlugin, WarPlugin

    public interface Plugin<T>

    A Plugin represents an extension to Gradle. A plugin applies some configuration to a target object. Usually, this target object is a Project, but plugins can be applied to any type of objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(T target)
      Apply this plugin to the given target object.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(T target)
        Apply this plugin to the given target object.
        Parameters:
        target - The target object
